code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./listcar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Listcar=()=>{const[carTypes,setCarTypes]=useState([]);const[showMore,setShowMore]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://admin.monzarentcar.com/api/types").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setCarTypes(data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching data:",error);});},[]);const handleViewMore=()=>{setShowMore(!showMore);};const images=["/lis1.webp","/lis2.webp","/lis3.webp","/lis4.webp","/lis5.webp","/sports2.webp"];const data=[{id:1,title:{en:'SVC'},image_url:'/4.webp',cars:1},{id:2,title:{en:'MAR'},image_url:'/5.webp',cars:13},{id:3,title:{en:'ROLS'},image_url:'/6.webp',cars:15},{id:4,title:{en:'MG'},image_url:'/2.webp',cars:5},{id:5,title:{en:'MINI'},image_url:'/1.webp',cars:10},{id:5,title:{en:'MINI'},image_url:'/4.webp',cars:10},{id:5,title:{en:'MINI'},image_url:'/6.webp',cars:10},{id:5,title:{en:'MINI'},image_url:'/5.webp',cars:10},{id:5,title:{en:'MINI'},image_url:'/1.webp',cars:10}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"car-list flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"car-list flex mini-cars",children:data.slice(0,showMore?carTypes.length:5).map((car,key)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"#!",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-back",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:car.image_url,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:car.title.en}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[car.cars," "]})]})},key))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"more-car",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:handleViewMore,children:[showMore?"View Less":"View More",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{className:"svgicon angle-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("use",{xlinkHref:"#angle-icon"})})]})})]});};export default Listcar;
